Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.network
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.messages.enums
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.socket
     
    it.polimi.ingsw.network.utils
     
  • Class
    Description
    AbortedGameMessage
    This message is sent from the server to connected clients when a connection error between a client and the server occurs
    AccessResultMessage
    This message is sent to a client after it successfully joins or creates a game(success), or after the access is denied as the game is full(failure).
    BeginningOfTurnMessage
    This message is sent to all logged in players and represents the beginning of a new turn.
    ChatMessage
    A chat message the sender username, the string that the sender wants to send (body), the list of users that should receive the message and the time at which the message is sent, which is automatically generated by the system.
    ConnectionEstablishedMessage
    A ConnectionEstablished message is sent to a client when a connection between the client and the server is established and the client can proceed with the login operations.
    EndOfGameMessage
    This message signals the end of the game and contains information regarding the recently finished game.
    EndOfTurnMessage
    This message signals the end of a turn and contains information regarding the recently finished turn.
    FoundSavedGameMessage
    This message is sent to the admin of the game as a notification that a game is saved.
    FoundSavedGameResponseMessage
    This message is sent from the client as a response to the request of reloading a new game, and it contains a response result, which may be positive or negative.
    GameStartMessage
    This message is broadcast to every player and contains information regarding the various game elements: the representation of the clientBoard, the shelves, the common and personal goal cards, the ordered list of players.
    JoinGameMessage
    A join game message is sent by a client when it wants to join the game.
    LoginRequestMessage
    A login request is a message sent to the server by a client that wants to log in with a username.
    LoginResponseMessage
    A login response is sent after a login request is received, and indicates that the login failed or happened with success.
    Message
    A message is the object that is sent between clients and the server through the network, and it contains information about moves done by the players, about communication logistics (login of a client, disconnection, ping), and about the state of the game.
    MessageWithResult
    This interface represents messages that contain the result to a requested action
    NewPlayerMessage
    The new player message contains the username of a newly joined player and is broadcast to all the players who've already joined.
    NotAdmittedMessage
    When the queue of players waiting to join a lobby is too big, say of size N, and there are only M available places, this message is sent to the last N-M players who are not admitted to the game
    NumberOfPlayersSelectionMessage
    This message is sent by the client as a response to the PickNumberOfPlayers message.
    PickFromBoardMessage
    This message is sent by the player that's active during a given turn, and contains a list of coordinates that correspond to object cards in the game board.
    PickFromBoardResultMessage
    This message is sent to the client as a validation of the PickFromBoardMessage.
    PickNumberOfPlayersMessage
    This message is sent when a client tries to join a game that doesn't exist yet: the client becomes the admin and creator of the game, and has to decide the number of player the game will have.
    PingRequestMessage
    This message is sent to each client by the server.
    SelectColumnMessage
    This message represents the choice of the shelf column in which to put the cards picked from the board.
    SelectColumnResultMessage
    This message contains the result of the choice of the shelf column coming from the user.
    WaitForLobbyMessage
    This message is sent to every client who logged while a player is deciding the number of players that should participate in the game
